import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Baseurl } from '../baseurl' import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const LatestCourses = () => { document.title = 'Fromhome | Login Page' const [course, setCourse] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${Baseurl}latestcourses`, { }).then((res) => { if (res.data) { setCourse(res.data) } }) }, []) return ( <>
Latest Courses {course.length ? course.filter((item, index) => index < 3).map((item, index) => { return ( <>
Latest
{item.course_title}
₦{item.course_cost} ₦{item.course_cost + 1500}
) }).reverse() :
}
) } export default LatestCourses
